column1: Baby Barnaby's////When the food comes out
column2: it's apparent that no one is going to finish their food.  For a hip and gay breakfast joint
column3: the portions are pretty impressive.  The green eggs
column4: which are scrambled with artichoke hearts
column5: spinach and cheese were good on their own.  However
column6: when married with the chicken apple sausage
column7: it's damn near magical.  The flavors are so calm and pastel and go together like a hand and a glove.  Then enters the subtly spicy and super crunchy potatoes for contrast.  Wash it down with a gulp of freshly squeezed OJ and it really is breakfast perfect.
